name: SWS Directory/Interactive Map
upgrade_notice: Keeping up with the lastest version means fewer errors.
author: Sharon Stromberg

sections.description:
This plugin creates shortcodes for displaying maps and directories using data pulled from the DBI system.
  • [sws_dir_listing group='conf_asam' group2='conf_dir' all_conf='Y' group_by_conf='Y' min_title='ASAM' show_prefixes='Y']
  • [sws_dir_search group='conf_asam' min_title='ASAM' show_prefixes='Y']
  • [sws_dir_photo group='conf_asam' group2='conf_dir' all_conf='Y' group_by_conf='Y' min_title='ASAM' show_prefixes='Y']
